alert.note: Alert for Coleman (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 26 at 6:04PM CST by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHERN COLEMAN COUNTY THROUGH 645 PM CST... At 603 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Novice, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Novice, Silver Valley, Goldsboro, Us-283 Near The Coleman- Callahan County Line, Echo, and Lake Coleman. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
